SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT CL_NO ,G.CT_NAME ,T.TT_NAME ,CL_NAME ,C.ENROLL_DATE ,CL_STATUS
FROM CLASS C JOIN CATEGORY G USING (CT_NO) JOIN TUTOR T USING (MEM_NO) ORDER BY CL_NO DESC )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, MEM_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID =? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND GRADE = 0 AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT CL_NO, CT_NAME, CT_DNAME, TT_NAME, LOCAL_NAME, DISTR_NAME, CL_NAME, CL_ADDRESS, CL_MAX, CL_LEVEL, START_DATE, END_DATE, CL_TIMES, CL_SCHEDULE, CL_DAY, CL_PRICE, CL_DETAIL, CURRICULUM, REFUNDPOLICY, CL_SUPPLIES, KEYWORD, C.ENROLL_DATE, CL_STATUS, CL_THUMB, INTRODUCE FROM CLASS C JOIN CATEGORY G USING (CT_NO) JOIN DCATEGORY D USING (CT_DNO) JOIN TUTOR T USING (MEM_NO) JOIN LOCATION USING (LOCAL_CODE) JOIN DISTRICT USING (DISTR_CODE) WHERE CL_NO =?
SELECT CL_DETAIL FROM CLASS WHERE CL_NO =?
SELECT SCH_NO ,CL_NO ,SESSION_NO ,START_TIME ,END_TIME FROM SCHEDULE WHERE CL_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "count" FROM CLASS WHERE CL_STATUS =0

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT CL_NO ,G.CT_NAME ,T.TT_NAME ,CL_NAME ,C.ENROLL_DATE ,CL_STATUS
FROM CLASS C JOIN CATEGORY G USING (CT_NO) JOIN TUTOR T USING (MEM_NO) WHERE CL_STATUS = 0 ORDER BY CL_NO DESC )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
